general_advisory: Seeing the clear sky, farmers can go for spraying activities. Regularly monitor the crop fields for the insect and disease infestation. Make provisions for light bulbs or heater to provide enough heat to the chicks.

advisory: Vegetative
Prevailing weather condition is favorable for thrips attack. Install Blue Sticky Trap @ 8nos/acre to control and monitor pest population.
Apply neem-based pesticide Azadiractin 1500 ppm @ 3ml/liter of water at initial stage of infestation.
To control chemically apply 3 g Acetamiprid 15% SP or 4 ml Imidacloprid 17.8% SL mixed with 15 liters of water
Sowing
Spray Pendimethalin 30% EC @1.2 liter/acre in 200 lt of water within 1-2 days of sowing to control weeds.
Maturity -Harvesting
Older plants become stunted.
Collect and destroy the damaged and dead plants
Light trap @1/ha to attract and kill adults
Spray neem oil 2ml/lit.
Maturity
Cauliflower borer can be managed by manually destroying the borers.
In case of heavy infestation of borers spray Cartap hydrochloride @ 6 g/15 Liters of water.
Transplanting
Prepare the main field for timely transplanting. Apply DAP 44 kg + MOP 22 kg per acre as basal dose during final puddling.
Transplant 3-4-week-old seedlings in well puddled soil at a spacing of 15 cm Ã—15 cm with 3-4 seedlings per hill at shallow depth.
Make provisions for light bulbs or heater to provide enough heat to the chicks.
Along with the vaccination provide suitable amount of heat for first 2-3 weeks.
Reduce the humidity of the floor and clean the litter regularly.
